text: Hey folks. I was looking at an old blog post that suggest running `include(joinpath(dirname(JULIA_HOME),"share","julia","build_sysimg.jl")); build_sysimg(force=true)` to turn on julia optimizations for my linux x64 architecture. I have not seen any other mentions about this, so I was wondering if this is still a good thing to do, or not needed anymore?
